text:
:tada: *Add custom extension cards to Preview sidebar* :tada:
We added a brand new and powerful location for Custom Cards (UI extensions) - Preview Sidebar (`crm.preview` location). This allows users to view UI extensions without opening record pages, to get the right information from the right place.

:arrow_forward:  <https://www.loom.com/share/183b1f37a018433fa7e9b82d9cd4a56d|Watch this Loom to know how it works>

There are three pages where this sidebar shows up
• Object index pages (Deals, Tickets, Companies, Contacts, and custom objects)
• All object record pages
• Contact Lists
:information_source: To stay posted on some of the larger features, use Product Updates page on your account, and look out for "In Development" updates.
We continue to look for more locations where developers can plug-in their extensions. If you have use cases, drop them in comments.
You always beat me to the updates :smile: . Thanks for being our champion
Always, I just love seeing the changes and can't keep them to myself

Hi there. I trust you are all well.

Please might I ask... I'm wondering how I can join the beta.
I don't seem to have it listed in my `All product updates`.
Do you have sales or service enterprise?

<@U01QVR44MEY> Hi there.

That's a good question. I only have the free CRM.

I'm coming from the point of view of creating an integration for 3rd parties to use our product within HubSpot.

Are there developer versions, sandboxes or similar that don't require sales or service enterprise?
yeah you can use this in a developer sandbox, you can't however build react cards for public apps yet if that's what you're trying to do
It's on a portal per portal basis

Great. Please might I kindly ask if you can point me in the direction of a developer sandbox?

I'm in the POC stage at the moment to check to see if I can get things working. Not plan for public apps just yet.
yes of course, you can setup a developer account here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/signup-HubSpot/developers?step=existing_user>
